mapper.select: SELECT TAGID, TAGNAME, TAGDESC, TAGMODE, TAGDATATYPE, TAGVALUE, TAGVALUEDESC, TAGSRVTIMESTAMP, TAGQUALITYDESC, TAGUNIT, TAGSIMULATED, TAGLOGGED, TAGVALUEDICTIONARY, TAGDIPADDRESS, TAGJAPCADDRESS, TAGRULE, TAGRULEIDS, ALARMID FROM DATATAG LEFT OUTER JOIN ALARM ON ALARM_TAGID = TAGID WHERE TAGCONTROLTAG=0 AND TAGRULE IS NOT NULL

SELECT TAGID, TAGNAME, TAGDESC, TAGMODE, TAGDATATYPE, TAGVALUE, TAGVALUEDESC, TAGSRVTIMESTAMP, TAGQUALITYDESC, TAGUNIT, TAGSIMULATED, TAGLOGGED, TAGVALUEDICTIONARY, TAGDIPADDRESS, TAGJAPCADDRESS, TAGRULE, TAGRULEIDS, ALARMID FROM DATATAG LEFT OUTER JOIN ALARM ON ALARM_TAGID = TAGID WHERE TAGCONTROLTAG=0 AND TAGRULE IS NOT NULL AND TAGID >= #{firstId} AND TAGID <= #{lastId}
